name: The Block Pro
title: December Utf8b4ocymjq NFT Marketplace Recap
text:
Synopsis
The NFT marketplace experienced a significant 267.1% month-over-month surge in December 2024, primarily driven by the PENGU token airdrop in the Pudgy Penguin ecosystem, while the broader crypto market faced challenges from potential Federal Reserve monetary policy adjustments.

Key Insights
- NFT trading volumes increased by 267.1% month-over-month in December 2024
- The surge was attributed to the PENGU token airdrop for Pudgy Penguin community members
- Layer 2 (L2) networks saw a total value locked (TVL) decline of 8.2% (over $4 billion) in December
- Crypto markets reacted negatively to the U.S. Fed's indication of fewer rate cuts expected in 2025
- Ethereum implemented proto-danksharding (EIP-4844) in the Dencun upgrade in March 2024, creating a separate fee market for "blobspace"
